Events.OnCreate:
(switch (!= (objGetData gPlayerShip 'blackMarketLevel) 2) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Set up the mission (block Nil ; No intro for this mission (msnSetProperty gSource 'isIntroShown True)
; Remember the system and station ID (msnSetData gSource 'destNodeID 'SK) ) )
Events.OnPlayerEnteredSystem: ; unvFindObject does not include virtual objects, so need to ; search for the Arcology when we enter the system (if (= (sysGetNode) (msnGetData gSource 'destNodeID)) (msnSetData gSource 'paneID (objGetID (sysFindObject Nil "TNV +stKatsArcology;"))) )
Events.OnObjDocked: (switch (and (= aObjDocked gPlayerShip) (objMatches aDockTarget Nil "sTAV +blackMarket;") (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*U +SealedContainer;")) ) (msnFailure gSource) )
Events.OnCompleted:
(switch (= aReason 'success) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itBlackMarketContainer; 1)) (objIncData gPlayerShip 'blackMarketXP 150) )
(= aReason 'failure) (block Nil (objIncData gPlayerShip 'blackMarketCrimeCost 50000) (objSetData gPlayerShip 'blackMarketCrime "losing valuable cargo") ) )

Language.Text:
(cat "Deliver cargo to the Victorian at the Commonwealth station in the " (sysGetName (msnGetData gSource 'destNodeID)) " system.

"
"System: " (sysGetName) "
" "Payment: " (fmtCurrency 'credit (msnGetData gSource 'reward)) )

(cat "The dark-haired woman looks down at some papers and says, " "\"As a matter of fact, I was thinking of you. We need you to deliver " "some cargo to St. Katharine's. Do you think you could do that?\"" )
(cat "\"Take this container to the Victorian at the Commonwealth station in " "St. Katharine's Star. Do not take it through customs, obviously. " "Be careful and good luck!\"" )
(cat "The dark-haired woman frowns for a second, \"I'm sorry you feel that way. " "I will inform Lord Mikho.\"" )
"\"I have [n]o idea what you're talking about.\""

(cat "You are in a large dance club where women and men dressed in leather " "and lace dance to classical music. A nondescript man dances next to " "you and whispers, \"I hope you have what I need.\"" )
(cat "The nondescript man follows you to your cargo hold and takes the sealed " "container. He smiles as he leaves, \"Say hello to Aubrey for me!\"" )
